column1: Since the first case of infection with the corona virus in South Africa in March, 1837 new cases were reported for the first time in a day. 4/n #SouthAfrica #CoronaVirusUpdates #CoronavirusPandemic #StayHomeStaySafe #Worldwide

England Risks Losing Control Of The Coronavirus Pandemic Because It Is Lifting Its Lockdown Without A Fully Operational Track-And-Trace Program In Place. #England #CoronaUpdates #Covid_19 #pandemic #StaySafeStayHealthy #StayAlert
